mapper.sql: UserID, UserName, UserCName, Password, deleted, Online, LastOnlineTime, AllOnlineTime, LoginTimes, CurrentLoginDateTime, LastOprtnDateTime

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from xpGrid_User
order by ${orderByClause}
